andromeda.why: Forming initial opinions is personal cognition, not rescue or anti-domination work.

arcturus.why: Begins structuring thought—facts, definitions, and a clean logic container.

draco.why: Early correctness anxiety can slide into status/gatekeeping about who is ‘right.’

lyra.why: Focus is logic, not aesthetic display.

orion-dark.why: Grabbing rigid formulas to feel safe—doctrine over discovery.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of discipline: test opinions against evidence before speaking.

pleiades.why: Attuned listening helps opinions land without friction.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching cognition; no formal transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Guarding how/when to share opinions ≠ liberation mission.

arcturus.why: Places critique in the right context and pacing so it’s usable.

draco.why: ‘Proper’ channels for opinions can become rank/permission games.

orion-dark.why: Hiding behind procedure over truth when pressured.

orion-light.why: Honorable restraint: speak when the case is ready, not to perform.

pleiades.why: Relational attunement—opinions offered with care are received.

sirius.why: Process stewardship without explicit teaching/codification yet.

andromeda.why: Refuses mental coercion; learns to own a view without capture.

arcturus.why: Irregular evidence/logic; oscillates between methods under stress.

draco.why: Defensive posturing and correctness policing when challenged.

lyra.why: This is about validity, not style.

orion-dark.why: Gravitates to dogma to escape uncertainty—compliance over inquiry.

orion-light.why: Initiatory grind: revise the opinion publicly when facts change.

andromeda.why: Standardizing critique is order-making, not chain-breaking.

arcturus.why: Turns opinions into testable models—definitions, steps, review loops.

draco.why: Success can invite gatekeeping of who may ‘speak logically.’

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-method: others face the ordeal of aligning to evidence.

pleiades.why: Considerate tone keeps minds open during critique.

sirius.why: Pedagogy-by-framework: teaches logic through clear protocols.

andromeda.why: Refuses propaganda capture; keeps opinion sovereign under projection.

arcturus.why: Cast as ‘fix everyone’s thinking’ → burnout/scapegoat when nuance resists.

draco.why: Authority aura invites rank tests and access policing in debates.

lyra.why: Clear, resonant delivery sets a cultural tone for rational discourse.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine capture: enforcing orthodoxy to preserve image/control.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—stand by evidence, not applause.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: models ethical critique despite crowd pressure.

andromeda.why: Loosens mental control; frees discourse from dogma and domination.

arcturus.why: Elder logic: maintains standards of evidence, review, and revision over time.

draco.why: Legacy status can drift into gatekeeping of ‘who gets to be rational.’

lyra.why: Elegant, sparing rhetoric that illuminates without theatrics.

orion-dark.why: Turning method into law—orthodoxy over living inquiry.

orion-light.why: Elder ordeal: hold intellectual courage and humility simultaneously.

pleiades.why: Focus is standards of thought, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Reasoning sage—teaches the law of sound judgment by lived example.
